name: Alligator
description: The alligator is a medium-sized beast known for its agility in water and formidable bite, utilizing its speed to ambush prey both in water and on land.
memorable: Its ability to grapple opponents with its bite attack can turn the tide of a skirmish, restricting target movement.
goals: Primarily a predator, it seeks to ambush prey.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other aquatic or swamp creatures.
environment: Typically found in aquatic or swamp environments.
strengths: Good physical threat due to high strength and ability to grapple prey.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its effectiveness in social interactions.
attacks: Bite attack with a +4 to hit, dealing 5 piercing damage and grappling the target.
most_powerful_ability: Hold Breath for 15 minutes, enabling it to stay submerged and ambush effectively.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception score of 10.
skills: Proficient in stealth, allowing it to move quietly when approaching prey.
additional_information: Abilities to grapple and restrain targets.
Relatively resilient due to natural armor.
Good ambush predator due to speed in aquatic environments.
